full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DA LTA SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG NYIN GYI SKAR MA BZHIN 'GA' ZHIG YOD KYANG PHYUGS BZHI LONGS SPYOD NA'ANG, STONG PA MED PA ZHES PA'I DBANG GIS RKYEN GYIS MA BYAS KYANG MANG NAS, NOR GYI LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I DNGOS GRUB ZHUB GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI RIM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA MANG DU YOD KYANG RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYOBS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR PA @013B ZHES PA'I MDZAD PA SOGS SKAD MDOR BSDUS PA ZHIG LAS GZHAN MED PAS, BLA MA DE NI GRUB PA THOB PA ZHIG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHIS PA BYUNG BA'I GSUNGS YIN PAS DE LA THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG BSANGS MCHOD GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYIS BSKANG TE THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DOGS MED NA'ANG, 'DI 'JIG RTEN DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA BDAG 'DRA BA RES 'GA' PHAN SNYAM DKAR PO'I SEMS GYI BSKUL TE, ^DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN PA AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
